name: Pre Call
description:
Next step is a piece of cake! You take a connector and link all those people!  

When the talk is finished - don’t forget to unplug the connector.  

And yeah… if you accidentally or by any other reason plug in the connector in the wrong socket - you done, dear. Time goes backwards, and you stuck in a loop.

If you manage to connect all the people - the Demon of Time will be defeated, and you will be saved from the infinite loop of your working day. Good luck!  

Dev Team:

Changelog:
Update 0.2  
* Fixed several text / voice inconsistencies. 
* Rework difficulty (now you can complete the game lol). Old difficulty stay as an option.  
* Few graphical changes
